===Etymology===
The adjective sense was originally from {{cog|nan|龜毛|tr=ku-mo͘||turtle fur}}. It was most likely a reference to {{zh-l|龜毛兔角}} ("an impossibility", literally "turtle fur and rabbit horns"), a Buddhist metaphor that describes hollow logic.
